headline: SPECTRUM GUARANTEES $1,000 SAVINGS IN THE FIRST YEAR FOR CUSTOMERS WHO FLEE THE BIG 3
summary: Spectrum – America's Connectivity Company™ – has unveiled one of its most powerful value pledges to date, guaranteeing new customers $1,000 in savings their first year if they switch their mobile service from AT&T, T-Mobile or Verizon to at least two Unlimited lines of Spectrum Mobile and transfer their internet service from any provider to Spectrum Internet Advantage or a higher speed tier.

headline: Aeris and Verizon Business Simplify Global IoT Expansion with Unified Connectivity and Orchestration
summary: CHICAGO, February 24, 2026--Aeris, a global leader in wireless management platforms, security services and connected vehicle programs, today announced an inbound IoT connectivity management relationship with Verizon Business to transform how multinational enterprises manage and scale international IoT deployments. headline: 20 Years on Wall Street Taught Me: Boomers Feel Safe With 5 High-Yield Dividend Giants
summary: After a 35-year career in the finance industry, including two decades as an institutional stockbroker at Bear Stearns, Lehman Brothers, and Morgan Stanley, I developed an institutional perspective on dividend-focused investing. My tenure at these premier Wall Street firms exposed me to fundamental analysis, credit evaluation, and risk management practices, which directly translate into selecting ... 20 Years on Wall Street Taught Me: Boomers Feel Safe With 5 High-Yield Dividend Giants

headline: Wireless Router Market Competitive Landscape Report 2025: Key Players Analysis, Profiles, Strategic Developments, Mergers, Product Innovations, Revenue Insights, and Future Forecasts to 2033
summary: The global wireless router market is poised to grow from $15.44 billion in 2025 to $29.92 billion by 2033, with a CAGR of 8.62%. Factors such as increasing high-speed internet demand, smart home IoT device installations, and technologies like Wi-Fi 6 and 5G drive this surge. Wireless routers, essential in connecting digital devices to the internet, are seeing advancements in speed, security, and capability, including Wi-Fi 6 and mesh networking.
